authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Invite a user to a NextCloud organization

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve information about a single user

options.name: Update
options.description: Edit attributes related to a user

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

path.name: path
path.description: The path of which to list the content. The path should start with "/".
path.ai_hint: The path of which to list the content. The path should start with "/".

toPath.name: toPath
toPath.description: The new path of file or folder. The path should start with "/".
toPath.ai_hint: The new path of file or folder. The path should start with "/".

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.ai_hint: The text content of the file to upload

shareType.name: shareType
shareType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

circleId.name: circleId
circleId.description: The ID of the circle to share with
circleId.ai_hint: The ID of the circle to share with

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the user to invite
email.ai_hint: The email of the user to invite

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: The ID of the group to share with
groupId.ai_hint: The ID of the group to share with

options.name: options
options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: displayName
options.description: The display name of the user to invite

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: Address
options.description: The new address for the user

options.name: Display Name
options.description: The new display name for the user

options.name: Email
options.description: The new email for the user

options.name: Password
options.description: The new password for the user

options.name: Twitter
options.description: The new twitter handle for the user

options.name: Website
options.description: The new website for the user

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toPath'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toPath'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryDataUpload'
IF binaryDataUpload == False AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF binaryDataUpload == True AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'shareType'
IF resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND operation == 'share' AND shareType == 7 THEN SHOW parameter 'circleId'
IF resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND operation == 'share' AND shareType == 4 THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND operation == 'share' AND shareType == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND operation == 'share' AND shareType == 0 THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND operation == 'share' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /resource IN ["file", "folder"] AND /operation == 'share' AND /shareType == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'list' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
